name: Fairy Flight
description:
Fairy Flight is a simple infinite flying game, that has been done in roughly 14 hours., as part of a self-imposed 1-day game challenge.

The controls are simple: click and hold the left mouse button so the fairy ascends. Good luck, enjoy!

The reason we're asking a price is so we can continue the development.
Planned changes until final release include: multiple environments, character customization, animated obstacles for more aesthetics, fine tuning the physics system, score board, achievement system, non-linear event system (such as junctions so you can choose which route to take) and power ups.
